## ouroctl apply translation

Apply translations from Excel file

### Synopsis

Apply translations for multiple languages to update localized text strings in the system.

```
ouroctl apply translation [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  # Apply translations from an Excel file
  ouroctl apply translation --file translation_pl-PL.xlsx
```

### Options

```
  -f, --file string   Path to the template file to apply
  -h, --help          help for translation
```

### SEE ALSO

* [ouroctl apply](ouroctl_apply.md)	 - Apply templates and configurations to the system
